title: Android app deals of the day: Chrono Trigger, Dwarf Journey, Heroes of Flatlandia, more
content:
Mario Day 2022 is in full swing but we are ready to take a quick break for all of today’s best deals on Android games and apps. Just make sure to dive into our price drops on Samsung’s new Galaxy Tab A8 tablets and its latest Galaxy Watch 4 models as well. This afternoon has a 50% discount  available on the absolute classic RPG Chrono Trigger alongside deals on Dwarf Journey, Kenshō, Heroes of Flatlandia, Dungeon of the Endless: Apogee, and more. head below the fold for today’s best Android app deals. 

more…
